articles.description: Actor is 18th person to claim grand slam of an Emmy, an Oscar, a Tony and now a Grammy
articles.content:
Viola Davis has has joined the elite group of Egot winners with her victory at the Grammy awards on Sunday.
Known as US entertainments grand slam, the illustrious acronym Egot signifies a recipient … [+1776 chars]
